alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Wright, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Portland, Villa Tasso, Port Washington, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Miramar Beach, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Ridge, Gulf Pines, New Home, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Seagrove Beach, Sandestin and Mossy Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton
